official_title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require Environmental Protection Agency automobile fuel economy tests to be based upon actual road conditions.

summary.text: Truth in Mileage Act of 1985 - Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to base its automobile fuel economy tests upon actual road testing. Sets forth criminal penalties for EPA employees who knowingly falsify the results of such tests.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require Environmental Protection Agency automobile fuel economy tests to be based upon actual road conditions.
